name: AppHarbrNimbusAdapter
summary: AppHarbr by GeoEdge: Secure, High-Quality Ads for Optimal User Experience (NimbusSDK 2.25.0-2.26.1 Compatible)
description:
AppHarbr by GeoEdge is a powerful tool that empowers app publishers to deliver secure, effective, and contextually-appropriate ads that enhance the user experience. With AppHarbr, publishers can leverage advanced ad scanning and verification technologies to ensure that only safe and high-quality ads are served. This helps to reduce the risk of malicious or inappropriate ads, while also optimizing user engagement. Whether you're looking to enhance user experience, or simply improve ad quality and security, AppHarbr by GeoEdge is the ultimate solution.

This adapter version supports NimbusSDK versions 2.25.0 through 2.26.1
